reference.title: JojaMart Hours & Location
reference.shortdesc: JojaMart is a store owned by the player's previous employer the Joja Corporation. This store is the main competitor to Pierre's General Store.

section.title: Hours
section.note: JojaMart permanently closes when player completes the Community Center.

sl.sli: JojaMart is located directly north of the Blacksmith on the north east edge of Pelican Town.
